sentence.Network_en: Ex - servicemen march past The Cenotaph during the Remembrance Sunday service in Whitehall, London.
sentence.Network_cn: 在伦敦怀特霍尔纪念日仪式上, 退役军人列队走过纪念塔.

sentence.Network_en: The Queen pain homage to the victims of two world wars by wreath on the Cenotaph.
sentence.Network_cn: 女王向纪念碑了献花圈,以此向两次世界大战这中的牺牲者们表示敬意.

sentence.Network_en: They have not found his body, so they just make a cenotaph for him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他死后没有找到尸体, 只能做了一个衣冠冢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 经过和平纪念碑(Cenotaph)不忘肃立向二次大战时的英烈致敬，它跟英国那座一模一样，只是没有中文而已。现在的泰昌饼家是新店 …
用“纪”组词_百度知道 ... 纪念〖 souvenir〗 纪念碑〖 monument;cenotaph;column〗 纪实〖 recordofactualevent;on-the-spotreport〗.
幽默诙谐剖析世界的词条：魔鬼辞典-人文社科... ... 公墓( cemetery,n) 衣冠冢( cenotaph,n) 检查官( censor,n).
广场中央有阵亡纪念碑（Cenotaph）。每周四的中午由军乐队举行献花仪式。

list.abs: on the artistic value of the calligraphy of the cenotaph of national southwest associated university ., 国立西南联合大学纪念碑书法艺术价值谈.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French cénotaphe, from late Latin cenotaphium, from Greek kenos 'empty' + taphos 'tomb'

entry.def: A cenotaph is a structure that is built in honour of soldiers who died in a war.

means.word_mean: 1. a monument built to honor soldiers who died in a war

auth_sentence.content: He said the 1987 bombing in which 11 people were killed at the Cenotaph was "atrocious".
